title: Truss, Interrupted
itunes:title: Truss, Interrupted
description:
Liz Truss delivered her keynote address to the Conservative Party conference, promising "growth, growth, and growth" after a bruising few days for the Prime Minister. The speech was briefly interrupted by anti-fracking protestors carrying Greenpeace banners. Bloomberg's Stephen Carroll and Caroline Hepker bring you highlights from the Prime Minister's comments, plus analysis from our reporter James Woolcock in Birmingham, and Opinion columnist Marcus Ashworth. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Liz Truss delivered her keynote address to the Conservative Party conference, promising "growth, growth, and growth" after a bruising few days for the Prime Minister. The speech was briefly interrupted by anti-fracking protestors carrying Greenpeace banners. Bloomberg's Stephen Carroll and Caroline Hepker bring you highlights from the Prime Minister's comments, plus analysis from our reporter James Woolcock in Birmingham, and Opinion columnist Marcus Ashworth.
